thread.title: BRIEF-Espey Mfg & Electronics Corp Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share $0.69

title: BRIEF-Espey Mfg & Electronics Corp Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share $0.69
text: 19 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Espey Mfg & Electronics Corp Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share $0.69 Reuters Staff Feb 13 (Reuters) - Espey Mfg And Electronics Corp: * ESPEY MFG. & ELECTRONICS CORP. REPORTS SECOND QUARTER RESULTS * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.69 * ESPEY MFG AND ELECTRONICS - ‍BACKLOG FOR CO WAS $38.4 MILLION AT DECEMBER 31, 2017, COMPARED WITH LAST YEAR‘S BACKLOG OF $38.2 MILLION AT DECEMBER 31, 2016​ * ESPEY MFG AND ELECTRONICS - NET SALES FOR Q2 2018 WERE $11.5 MILLION, COMPARED WITH LAST YEAR‘S Q2 NET SALES OF $5.7 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
